name: vufind
description: Dev tools to handle css preprocessing, js magic, compression and Swagger UI for the API

scripts.postinstall: rm -rf public/swagger-ui; cp -r node_modules/swagger-ui/dist public/swagger-ui; sed -i.orig "s/defaultModelRendering: 'schema'/defaultModelRendering: 'model'/" public/swagger-ui/index.html; sed -i.orig 's/url = ".*"/url = "..\/..\/api\/v1\?swagger"/' public/swagger-ui/index.html
